actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Gold Reserve Act of 1934 to impose certain restrictions on the purchase and sale of gold by the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Gold Reserve Act of 1934 to require Congressional authorization of all sales and purchases of gold on behalf of the United States except for those effectuated to maintain or establish a permanent relationship between the dollar and a specified quantity of gold.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Gold Reserve Act of 1934 to impose certain restrictions on the purchase and sale of gold by the United States.
